overview: In celebration of her multi-platinium acclaimed record "Halcyon" turning 10 years since it's release, Ellie Goulding drops "Halcyon Nights", a re-edition incluiding all the songs released from that era, with a live concert filmed in Troubadour in 2012 of her "Halcyon tour".
tagline: In celebration of ten years of Halcyon, witness #HalcyonNights.
title: Halcyon Nights (Live At The Troubadour 2012)
